alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:49PM EDT until May 16 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR EASTERN BENNINGTON AND WINDHAM COUNTIES... At 549 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mt. Tabor to near Townshend to near Guilford Center, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Bellows Falls, Londonderry, Townshend, Manchester, Stratton, Putney, Vernon, Dorset, Wilmington, Readsboro, Saxtons River, Westminster, Newfane, Guilford Center, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Hinsdale, Westmoreland and Walpole. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
